lesson_1.Title: Appetizer
lesson_1.Memo: "Jelo" means "meal". "Pred" means "before" or "in front of". Therefore "predjelo" is a meal before a meal.

lesson_2.Title: Soup
lesson_2.Memo:
"Pileća juha" = "Chicken soup"
"Povrtna juha / juha od povrća" = "Vegetable soup"
"Goveđa juha" = "Beef soup"
"Juha od rajčice" = "Tomato soup"
"Juha od gljiva" = "Mashroom soup"

lesson_3.Title: Main course
lesson_3.Memo: The word "glavno", meaning "main", comes from the word "glava", meaning "head".

lesson_5.Title: Meat
lesson_5.Memo:
When used as an adjective the word is "mesni", "mesna", or "mesne" for example:
"mesne okruglice" = "meat balls"
"mesni odrezak" = "meat steak"

lesson_6.Title: Chicken
lesson_6.Memo:
"pečena piletina" = "roasted chicken"
"pohana piletina" = "fried chicken"
"pileća juha" = "chicken soup"
"pileća krilca" = "chicken wings"

lesson_8.Title: Beef
lesson_8.Memo:
"Teletina" = "Beef meat, up to 12 months young"
"Junetina" = "Beef meat, 12 - 24 months young"
"Govedina" = "Beef meat, 24 months and older"
"Teleće pečenje" = "Roasted young beef"
"Juneća rebra" = "Beef ribs"
"Goveđi gulaš" = "Beef stew"

lesson_10.Title: Fish
lesson_10.Memo:
"Morska riba" = "Sea fish"
"Riječna riba" = "River fish"
"Svježa riba" = Fresh fish"

lesson_11.Title: Roast
lesson_11.Memo:
"Peć" = "Oven"
"Peći" = "To bake", "To roast"
"Pečem" = "I'm baking, I'm roasting"
"Pečenje" = "Roasted meat"

lesson_13.Title: Potato
lesson_13.Memo:
"Pečeni krumpir" = "Roasted potato"
"Kuhani krumpir" = "Boiled potato"
"Prženi krumpirići" = "French fries"

lesson_14.Title: Vegetables
lesson_14.Memo: Our word for garden is "vrt", and prefix "po" suggests something that is on top of something. Therefore "po-vrt-je" means something that is on the surface of a garden. "Tj" changes to "ć", and we have "povrće".

lesson_16.Title: Čevapčići
lesson_16.Memo: Popular dish in Croatia, traditionally from Bosnia And Herzegovina, made out of grilled finger-sized minced beef patties.

lesson_17.Title: Pancakes
lesson_17.Memo: Thin pancakes, common street food on Croatian coast during summer.
